oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Souvenirs; Tickets; Seals (Insignia); Business people
Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition (1897 : Nashville, Tenn.); Thomas, J. W. (John Wilson), 1830-1906
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A souvenir ticket of the Tennessee Centennial Exposition. The ticket commemorates J.W. Thomas Day held on Thursday, October 28, 1897. The front side of the ticket includes a picture of J.W. Thomas and bears the signature of Director General E. C. Lewis. The reverse side of the ticket contains an image of the Tennessee Centennial Exposition seal.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition Collection, 1895-1900
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: J. W. Thomas and Eugene C. Lewis were chief officers of the Nashville, Chattanooga, and St. Louis Railway. During the Exposition, J. W. Thomas served as President and Eugene C. Lewis as Director General.
